definitions.definition: Official residence of a head of state or other dignitary , especially in a monarchical or imperial governmental system.
A large and lavishly ornate residence.
A large, ornate public building used for entertainment or exhibitions.

main_definition: Official residence of a head of state or other dignitary , especially in a monarchical or imperial governmental system.
secondary_definitions: A large and lavishly ornate residence.
A large, ornate public building used for entertainment or exhibitions.
